rust_training.title: Rust Adoption & Training
rust_training.description: I help your team adopt Rust for new applications or migrate existing systems. From initial assessment to hands-on training, I guide companies through their complete Rust transformation.
rust_training.benefit1: Assess which projects benefit most from Rust adoption
rust_training.benefit2: Plan migration strategies for existing applications
rust_training.benefit3: Train your team with hands-on, tailored guidance

llm_integration.title: LLM Integration
llm_integration.description: Seamlessly connect large language models (LLMs) to your applications for enhanced automation, chatbots, and data processing. Custom solutions designed to integrate with your existing systems, ensuring scalability and performance.
llm_integration.benefit1: Integrate leading LLMs into your existing products
llm_integration.benefit2: Build custom knowledge bases for domain-specific applications
llm_integration.benefit4: Create robust evaluation systems for LLM outputs

chatbot.title: Chatbot Development
chatbot.description: Transform your apps with intelligent chatbots. From simple Q&A interfaces to complex conversational systems.
chatbot.benefit1: Transform any app into a conversational interface
chatbot.benefit2: Connect chatbots directly to your existing APIs
chatbot.benefit3: Handle complex user queries in natural language
chatbot.benefit4: Reduce support load with automated responses

api0.title: api0.ai Solutions
api0.description: My cutting-edge platform that uses advanced NLP to match user inputs to API endpoints, simplifying integrations for businesses. Easy to use, secure, and designed for minimal setup.
api0.benefit1: Match natural language inputs to the right API endpoints

about.hero_subtitle: Solo dev with 2 live AI tools + 1 MVP. All powered by my Rust + AI tech
about.description1: As a solo entrepreneur based in Switzerland, I build AI tools that actually work. My live portfolio: API0.AI, cVenom, and Solanize (MVP).
about.description2: Rather than promising, I deliver. My tools are live, testable, and powered by my homegrown Rust + AI stack.
about.description3: My work combines technical expertise with concrete results. 2 live tools + 1 MVP under heavy development.
about.description4: Operating proudly from the heart of Switzerland, I bring precision and reliability to every project.
